import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{getGenres,filterByGenre,orderByCreator,orderAsc,orderDesc}from"../../actions/index";import"./Filter.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Filter(_ref){let{paginate}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const genres=useSelector(store=>store.genres);useEffect(()=>{dispatch(getGenres());},[dispatch]);// Filtrado por genre
const handleFilter=e=>{dispatch(filterByGenre(e.target.value));paginate(e,1);};// Ordenado
const handleOrder=e=>{if(e.target.value==="asc_name"||e.target.value==="asc_rating"){dispatch(orderAsc(e.target.value));}else if(e.target.value==="desc_name"||e.target.value==="desc_rating"){dispatch(orderDesc(e.target.value));}else{// Si seleccionas "All" en el orden, resetea la ordenación y lista filtrada
dispatch({type:"ORDER_RESET"});paginate(e,1);}};// Filtrado por API/DB
const handleCreator=e=>{if(e.target.value==="Api"||e.target.value==="Created"){dispatch(orderByCreator(e.target.value));paginate(e,1);}else{dispatch(filterByGenre(e.target.value));paginate(e,1);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Filter by Genre"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{id:"filterGenre",onChange:e=>handleFilter(e),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"All",default:true,children:"All"},"All"),genres.map(G=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:G.name,children:G.name},G.name))]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Order"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{id:"order",onChange:e=>handleOrder(e),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"All",default:true,children:"All"},"All"),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"asc_name",children:"Alphabetically (A-Z)"},"asc_name"),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"desc_name",children:"Alphabetically (Z-A)"},"desc_name"),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"asc_rating",children:"Rating (Lower-Higher)"},"asc_rating"),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"desc_rating",children:"Rating (Higher-Lower)"},"desc_rating")]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Filter by Creator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{id:"filterCreator",onChange:e=>handleCreator(e),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"All",default:true,children:"All"},"All"),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Api",children:"Api videogames"},"Api"),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Created",children:"User videogames"},"Created")]})]})]});}export default Filter;
